dcterms:description: A biomedical-domain dataset focusing on drug-gene-mutation ternary relations, extracted from PubMed. It contains 6987 ternary instances about drug-gene-mutation relations, and 6087 binary instances about drug-mutation sub-relations.
dcterms:title: Biomedical-domain dataset focusing on drug-gene-mutation ternary relations
